alert.note: Alert for Benton (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 12 at 12:40AM EST by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...Patchy Dense Fog Across Central Illinois and Indiana Overnight... Dense fog was occurring across much of central Illinois and central Indiana late Wednesday evening, with visibilities of a quarter mile or less in some areas. Although visibility was better across northern Illinois and northwest Indiana, some locally dense fog is possible south of U.S. 24, or roughly south of a Chenoa to Watseka to Remington line. Fog will likely improve after 3 am as north winds begin to gradually increase. Until then, use caution if traveling in these areas overnight, and be alert for rapid changes in visibility in fog.
